Message.Msg: I was trying to think up a funny quid about this but I am afraid I am at a loss, I am too amazed to do it. So Universal wants to do more Bourne movies and you turn it into a conspiracy against you. Okey, fine, as soon my brain recovers from the shock I may be able to articulate something. In the meantime, and I completely serious about this, you should try getting some professional help about your post stress embitterment disorder. Or at least some English classes. Boy, do I miss the ignore option.

Message.Title: Only down 9 now and stock split info
Message.Msg: Google Inc. doesn't expect be able to split the stock until at least October. That's because Google won't do so until it resolves a shareholder lawsuit challenging the plan. The complaint, filed in Delaware state court, alleges that the board breached its fiduciary duty by acceding to the wishes of Page and Brin.
Today, even a beginner could make money with calls. GOOG started down and virtually went straight up.
